Name: Cube, Cubic n Cubie
QuestDesc:
You receive a message from Encore, saying that she has obtained something super amazing and fun, and that she's excited to share it with you. What could it be?
Head to Abbowser Castle and rescue your captured Cube companions. Stop Abbowser's evil plan and make sure the celebration goes off without a hitch!
To keep Abbowser from causing more trouble, you have to keep advancing in the Abbowser Castle.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hiya! It's been a while. Encore and the people at the Pioneer Association have made something super cool!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: They need someone to try it out, and I think you'd be just perfect! We should play it together!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's gonna be soooo much fun! Encore can't wait to see you!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Aha! I knew you'd join my team!

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Of course! So, where is that thing you mentioned?

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, no rush. Before that, do you know someone's celebrating their very first anniversary today?

Options.PlotLineKey: I bet I know which game you're talking about!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's <te href=800003>Second Coming of Solaris</te>! Happy first anniversary of the beta test!

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But I remember it was developed by the Pioneer Association. What makes you part of this?

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's an assignment Miss Shorekeeper gave me. During vacation, Encore needs to help Tethys prepare a special surprise in the game world!

Options.PlotLineKey: So I'm actually helping you with your homework?

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Uh-huh! Will you pleeease?

Options.PlotLineKey: Well, can you do that again? You know, that face!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hooray! You're the best!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ohh, got it!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Aww... Pwease help me... Pwetty pweeaaase...?

Options.PlotLineKey: Damn, can't say no to that!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hooray! You're the best!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let's get started now! Hello, Tethys? Can you hear me? We're all prepared!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now, you'll need an account in the game. How do you want to call yourself?

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Okay!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Okay!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hm? This name is already taken... Let's just use your own name, {PlayerName}!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Okay!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hm? This name is already taken... Let's just use your own name, {PlayerName}!

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I thought that would've been a unique name.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Anyway, your account is done. Now, it's time to let Encore's imagination flow...

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let's go! Got no time to waste!

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Turns out, the "super cool" thing is actually the Second Coming of Solaris, which has been in beta for a whole year. Encore asks for your help with her homework: developing a mysterious new feature for the game. Unable to resist her cuteness, you create an account and dive right into the world of Second Solaris.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ta-da! Welcome to the world of <te href=800003>Second Coming of Solaris</te>!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Tethys generated everything here after scanning you. Pretty amazing, right? Of course, Encore helped too! See that huge cake over there? That's Encore's design!

Options.PlotLineKey: Wait, why am I a Cube now?

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Because I turned you into one! Miss Shorekeeper could only grant me a tiny bit of Tethys' computing power, so this <te href=800004>Cube</te> is the best I could manage for you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ah... I'm so dizzy! What's going on?

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Look, it's an Abby Cube!

Options.PlotLineKey: Abby Cube? Isn't it the real Abby?

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Uh-uh. Only you and me are real here. The rest are replicas based on the scan results.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I followed Miss Shorekeeper's instructions and made 12 different Cubes! They should all be here... Huh?

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Where's the cake?
Ha, ha, ha! Don't bother looking for it!

Options.PlotLineKey: Another Abby Cube? Did you make two of them, Encore?

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Nope, only one.

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby (Evil)
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ha, ha, ha! I ain't no ordinary Abby! I'm the purest, most perfect Abby!

Dialogues.Speaker: Abbowser
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Body of perfection, eyes gleaming with wisdom, and a smile bursting with health! Yes, that's me, Abbowser!

Dialogues.Speaker: Abbowser
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Aha, you have a good taste! In that case, I'll go easy on you later.

Dialogues.Speaker: Abbowser
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The audacity! You'll regret underestimating me!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hello, Abbowser! Did you hide the <te href=800002>Anniversary Cake</te>?

Dialogues.Speaker: Abbowser
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Guess what? I ate it! Boo! This world is under my control now! Ha, ha, ha!

Dialogues.Speaker: Abbowser
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Looks like you haven't figured things out yet. Well, well, enjoy your blissful ignorance while you can, 'cause I'm cooking up something big!

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Upon entering the Second Coming of Solaris, you're shocked to find yourself transformed into a Cube. Before you can even process what's happening, the anniversary cake—the game's control unit—gets devoured by a mysterious Cube named "Abbowser"!

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wait, who was that?!

Options.PlotLineKey: That's not part of the test, is it?

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Nope, not at all. You were only supposed to chat with the <te href=800004>Cube</te>s. Super simple.
Disaster, Encore! <te href=800003>Second Coming of Solaris</te> is a mess right now!

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A Black Shores robot speeds over, panicked.
Encore, where is Aalto? Is he meddling with things again?!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, hi there, KU-Lolo! Aalto is not here. Encore was just making Cubes when a weird Cube called "Abbowser" showed up and ate the <ano=Control Unit><te href=800002>Anniversary Cake</te></ano>.

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Lolo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That explains it! Abbowser has hijacked the entire game!

Options.PlotLineKey: Can't you just reboot the server?

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Lolo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If only it were that simple. Now that the <ano=Control Unit>Anniversary Cake</ano> is taken, we can't back up data safely. Rebooting it now would put tons of critical data at risk.

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Lolo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Recovering them would take forever… the anniversary would be ruined, and I'd be the one everyone blames… Waaahhh!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Don't cry, Ku-Lolo! If there's a bad guy, that just means it's time for heroes to shine! The Wooly Warrior and the cool Black Cat Warrior will save the day, right?

Options.PlotLineKey: It's "Abby" who's causing trouble, not you.

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Lolo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Waaah, th-thank youuu!

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hey! Just to be clear, it's a different Abby. No way little Tethys could replicate an Echo like me! Let's go, {PlayerName}. We'll hunt down this "Abbowser" ourselves!

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Lolo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The logs show that Tethys generated 12 Remnant Cubes, but they've all gone missing after Abbowser's attack.

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Lolo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If we want to restore the <ano=Control Unit>Anniversary Cake</ano>, we'll need to rescue at least half of the Cubes.

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Lolo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Encore, could you contact the Pioneer Association and see if they have any good ideas?

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sure! Then I'll leave this to you, {PlayerName}. You can handle it—Encore believes in you!

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Just after Encore leaves, Abbowser crashes the scene, this time with a few familiar faces in tow.

Dialogues.Speaker: Abbowser
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ha, ha, ha! My tactic worked perfectly! Surprise! It's me again!

Dialogues.Speaker: Abbowser
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So you just let the world-saving hero Wooly Warrior leave like that? You're not as smart as they say, Black Cat Warrior.

Options.PlotLineKey: I can beat you myself, Abbowser!

Dialogues.Speaker: Abbowser
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Bruh, where's your sense of humor?

Dialogues.Speaker: Abbowser
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's the right line, Black Cat Warrior!

Dialogues.Speaker: Abbowser
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Anyway, how about we play a game?

Dialogues.Speaker: Abbowser
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Picture this: you show up in a strange land, take on my minions, save your buddies, and then face off with me in an epic boss fight! Classic! This is gonna be a blast!

Dialogues.Speaker: Abbowser
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now, I'm giving you a few Cubes as your first teammates. Can't say I'm throwing you into the deep end... muahaha!

Dialogues.Speaker: Abbowser
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'll be waiting for ya! Don't leave me hanging!

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: After swallowing the control unit, Abbowser takes control of Second Solaris and holds the other Cubes hostage, forcing you into a classic "Hero vs. Demon Lord" game. Given the mysterious connection between Abbowser and Abby, you decide to play along.

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wait, who was that?!

Options.PlotLineKey: That's not part of the test, is it?

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Nope, not at all. You were only supposed to chat with the <te href=800004>Cube</te>s. Super simple.
Disaster, Encore! <te href=800003>Second Coming of Solaris</te> is a mess right now!

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A Black Shores robot speeds over, panicked.
Encore, where is Aalto? Is he meddling with things again?!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, hi there, KU-Lolo! Aalto is not here. Encore was just making Cubes when a weird Cube called "Abbowser" showed up and ate the <ano=Control Unit><te href=800002>Anniversary Cake</te></ano>.

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Lolo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That explains it! Abbowser has hijacked the entire game!

Options.PlotLineKey: Can't you just reboot the server?

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Lolo

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Lolo

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Don't cry, Ku-Lolo! If there's a bad guy, that just means it's time for heroes to shine! The Wooly Warrior and the cool Black Cat Warrior will save the day, right?

Options.PlotLineKey: It's "Abby" who's causing trouble, not you.

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Lolo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Waaah, th-thank youuu!

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hey! Just to be clear, it's a different Abby. No way little Tethys could replicate an Echo like me! Let's go, {PlayerName}. We'll hunt down this "Abbowser" ourselves!

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Lolo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The logs show that Tethys generated 12 Remnant Cubes, but they've all gone missing after Abbowser's attack.

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Lolo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If we want to restore the <ano=Control Unit>Anniversary Cake</ano>, we'll need to rescue at least half of the Cubes.

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Lolo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Encore, could you contact the Pioneer Association and see if they have any good ideas?

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sure! Then I'll leave this to you, {PlayerName}. You can handle it—Encore believes in you!

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Just after Encore leaves, Abbowser crashes the scene, this time with a few familiar faces in tow.

Dialogues.Speaker: Abbowser
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ha, ha, ha! My tactic worked perfectly! Surprise! It's me again!

Dialogues.Speaker: Abbowser
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So you just let the world-saving hero Wooly Warrior leave like that? You're not as smart as they say, Black Cat Warrior.

Options.PlotLineKey: I can beat you myself, Abbowser!

Dialogues.Speaker: Abbowser
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Bruh, where's your sense of humor?

Dialogues.Speaker: Abbowser
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's the right line, Black Cat Warrior!

Dialogues.Speaker: Abbowser
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Anyway, how about we play a game?

Dialogues.Speaker: Abbowser
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Picture this: you show up in a strange land, take on my minions, save your buddies, and then face off with me in an epic boss fight! Classic! This is gonna be a blast!

Dialogues.Speaker: Abbowser
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now, I'm giving you a few Cubes as your first teammates. Can't say I'm throwing you into the deep end... muahaha!

Dialogues.Speaker: Abbowser
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'll be waiting for ya! Don't leave me hanging!

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: After swallowing the control unit, Abbowser takes control of Second Solaris and holds the other Cubes hostage, forcing you into a classic "Hero vs. Demon Lord" game. Given the mysterious connection between Abbowser and Abby, you decide to play along.

Dialogues.Speaker: Shorekeeper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm sorry for involving you in such trouble again.

Options.PlotLineKey: You don't have to bear everything alone.
It's never a burden when we can fix it together.

Dialogues.Speaker: Shorekeeper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes, you're right... Just like fixing the Tethys System, we will fix this together, you and I.

Dialogues.Speaker: Shorekeeper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: When Tethys issued a warning at the start of the event, I immediately tried to access this Sonoro Sphere called <te href=800003>Second Coming of Solaris</te>.

Dialogues.Speaker: Shorekeeper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: However, a peculiar entity calling itself "Abbowser" quickly blocked the <te href=800007>Channel</te>. I was only able to transmit data the size of a Remnant Cube.

Options.PlotLineKey: Does this mean you've come here in person?

Dialogues.Speaker: Shorekeeper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No. Like all the other Remnant <te href=800004>Cube</te>s, I am entirely separate from my true self.

Options.PlotLineKey: Hmm, is Abbowser also a Remnant Cube?

Dialogues.Speaker: Shorekeeper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I cannot say for certain. Since Abby is full of mysteries, the possible inferences are complicated.

Dialogues.Speaker: Shorekeeper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: However, I may be able to obtain more information if I physically interact with Abbowser.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Black Cat... I mean, {PlayerName}, is there anything troubling you? May I be of help?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I see. So the <ano=Second Coming of Solaris><te href=800006>Sonoro Sphere</te></ano> trapping us is the doing of Abbowser, a darker side of Abby, correct?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And to escape, we need to rescue our scattered <te href=800004>Cube</te> companions, defeat Abbowser, and remake the... <ano=Control Unit><te href=800002>Anniversary Cake</te></ano>?

Options.PlotLineKey: You are sharp as ever, Jinhsi.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName}, do you know the whereabouts of Sanhua, Ms. Taoqi, and General Jiyan?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Jinzhou is in the midst of a bustling festival, and if all the key leaders are trapped within this Sonoro Sphere, I must consider whether our emergency plan remains operational.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Since your last meeting with Jinhsi was in the spring, the Remnant Cube's memory is also set to that season.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Though only a Cube simulated by Tethys, it's as if she really is Jinhsi in the flesh...

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Don't worry, those outside won't be affected.

Options.PlotLineKey: I must ask for your help once again, Jinhsi.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If that's the case... No, while Jinzhou may be safe for now, the cake crisis we face still demands our attention.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No need for such formality. You are both the distinguished guest and savior of Jinzhou, {PlayerName}. I will always do my utmost to aid you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Once the crisis is over, perhaps we can take a stroll together?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I imagine you could also use a good break by then.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'll take care of the cake restoration. You can rest assured and focus on dealing with Abbowser, {PlayerName}.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm simply doing my duty. To be honest, I would feel quite lost with too much free time on my hands.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But what about you, {PlayerName}? After you left Jinzhou and... before you return...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Will you always be busy saving others like this?

Options.PlotLineKey: There are always people in need of help.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's true that there are always people in need of help.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I've been thinking, as the nightmare of your <te href=800006>Sonoro Sphere</te>, Abbowser isn't truly committing wicked deeds or confusing our minds. It is simply keeping us, or more precisely, you, here. But for what purpose?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Maybe it is only trying to give you a break from your mission, if only for a little while?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName}, Ms. Carlotta mentioned that during the Carnevale, one can witness spectacular Echo parades, marvel at grand troupe performances, and take part in enchanting masquerades!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Did you get to experience all of that?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmm, perhaps we might try including such performances in the Moon-Chasing Festival. I wonder if people in Jinzhou would like the idea.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Would you be our advisor for that, {PlayerName}?

Options.PlotLineKey: No problem, leave it to me!

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Such a fascinating little world. I've long heard of the Tethys System's versatility, but seeing its work is another thing.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, panicking wouldn't help the situation anyway.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Besides, wandering in the memories of someone like you, {PlayerName}, is in its own way a rare pleasure.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ah, do you prefer coffee? I see no tea sets in this square. I'll take that into consideration the next time I invite you for a game of Weiqi.

Options.PlotLineKey: I'll have whatever you prepare for me.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Heh, now if I don't treat you to some of my private collection next time, I'd be a terrible host.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Back to the issue at hand. {PlayerName}, this realm is called <te href=800003>Second Coming of Solaris</te>, yes?

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: How intriguing. The Second Coming of Solaris I know is still in testing, a far cry from what we're seeing here...

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If this is a world built on your memory, then there must be some kind of temporal discrepancy between what we remember.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmm, it could be you are from the "future," or perhaps I am from the "past."

Options.PlotLineKey: Ahem, some things are better left unsaid.
It's OK to act ignorant once in a while, Changli.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hehe, then let's consider this our little secret.

Options.PlotLineKey: Changli, have the burn marks on your left hand disappeared?

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmm? Oh... yes, indeed. I wouldn't have noticed without your keen observation.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Neither... It is merely the mark of the small price I paid for wielding the flame in my youth.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That healed long ago. Many of the costs are so trivial that they can hardly be called a "price."

Options.PlotLineKey: Someone asked me to remind you that too much spice is bad for your health.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hehe, a preference for spicy food is just another trivial price for the power of flame. However…

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Please pass that warning on to my true self once we leave the <te href=800006>Sonoro Sphere</te>.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: She would greatly appreciate it.

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Lolo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I've detected that Abbowser's gone and turned the game assets into a huge labyrinth. Big bad Abbowser! <te href=800003>Second Coming of Solaris</te> is totally wrecked now.

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Lolo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's even calling the labyrinth "Abbowser Castle." Outrageous!

Options.PlotLineKey: What a troublemaker! We must teach it a lesson!

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Lolo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, you sound super reliable! I'd probably short-circuit from crying by now… if I had tears.

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Lolo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Okay, I've located the areas where Abbowser is causing trouble. We're good to go whenever you're ready!

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Lolo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ready for the Abbowser Castle?

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You see Camellya <te href=800004>Cube</te> staying far away from the other Cubes, humming. It seems she really enjoys her solitude.

Dialogues.Speaker: Camellya
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Aw, not feeling the crowd? Or... do you just wanna stay with me?

Options.PlotLineKey: (Leave her and go to the other Cubes.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Camellya
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Alright, alright. You've still got things to do. Off you go then.

Dialogues.Speaker: Camellya
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Don't worry, I'll be keeping an eye on you here. The games ahead are also gonna be so much fun!

Dialogues.Speaker: Camellya
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You gotta learn to take a break when you can on your long, long journey to save Solaris.

Dialogues.Speaker: Camellya
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Go on, my dear leader. Enjoy your little holiday!

Dialogues.Speaker: Brant
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ahoy, you are right on time!

Dialogues.Speaker: Brant
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I was just pondering the perfect, grand performance for the anniversary, when lo and behold, what did I discover at the back of the square?

Dialogues.Speaker: Brant
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A cannon!

Dialogues.Speaker: Brant
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A sturdy sailor and a cannon. Ring a bell?

Dialogues.Speaker: Brant
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Haha, stay tuned!

Dialogues.Speaker: Abbowser
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ugh, you really ticked me off by taking Lady Primus, but since you also dealt with that pesky one trying to take my turf, I'll forgive you!

Dialogues.Speaker: Abbowser
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ha, ha, ha, now Level 10 will be mine again soon!

Dialogues.Speaker: Abbowser
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmph, you better start worrying about yourself! As the Big Boss, I'm about to show you what I'm really made of!

Dialogues.Speaker: Abbowser
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm sending my top three elites to deal with you. Each one's got a special surprise for you. Muahaha!

Dialogues.Speaker: Abbowser
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Alright, I'm off. Come face me, mortal! Oh, no. Almost forgot to ask...

Dialogues.Speaker: Abbowser
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Are you having fun?

Dialogues.Speaker: Abbowser
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hehe, great! I'll head back to my position and wait for you!

Dialogues.Speaker: Abbowser
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What? Just okay?! Just hold your horses. I've still got some more prep work to do!

Dialogues.Speaker: Abbowser
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: N-not having fun???

Dialogues.Speaker: Abbowser
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: J-just come back later. I need to recap!

Dialogues.Speaker: Abbowser
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Did you hear me? Come later... but not too late! Anyway, you have to come find me. I'll be waiting!

Dialogues.Speaker: Zani
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmm... Zzz...

Dialogues.Speaker: Zani
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Zzz... Forgot to clock out...

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ugh, that's rough! She's even thinking about her work in her dreams!

Dialogues.Speaker: Zani
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Okay... No problem. I still have plenty of time in my schedule...

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sheesh! Hey, wake up! Stop working!

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I wonder how Mr. Abbowser is doing.

Options.PlotLineKey: Planning some new mischief, I guess.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I don't think Mr. Abbowser is really that bad. Mischief is more like his way of life, or... how to put it, mission?

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It seems like Mr. Abbowser is more afraid of being forgotten than being disliked.

Options.PlotLineKey: Should I extend an invitation then?

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Er, maybe that's not necessary?

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I think the best way to communicate with Mr. Abbowser is to play the "Hero vs. Demon Lord" game with him!

Options.PlotLineKey: Alright, I'll be good at that.

Dialogues.Speaker: Cantarella
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: How may I be of service, noble hero? Have you come to check if I've been up to any villainous deeds?

Options.PlotLineKey: Seems you're giving yourself a break.

Dialogues.Speaker: Cantarella
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hehe, a rare treat, indeed. It would be lovely to linger here indefinitely.

Dialogues.Speaker: Cantarella
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And what of you? Will you disappear again once your noble deeds are done?

Dialogues.Speaker: Cantarella
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Leaving behind only the hearts you've touched, left to quietly yearn for your next visit. Such cold-heartedness.

Dialogues.Speaker: Cantarella
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: There, there. I was only teasing.

Dialogues.Speaker: Cantarella
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now, let us set aside our worries and savor this respite. It is, after all, a rare and precious break.

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Lolo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Finally, you have saved all the <te href=800004>Cube</te>s! Thank you so much, {PlayerName}!

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Lolo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm activating the <ano=Control Unit><te href=800002>Anniversary Cake</te></ano> to start the ceremony now. Ready?

Dialogues.Speaker: Cartethyia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hehe.

Dialogues.Speaker: Cartethyia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Everyone is enjoying the moment, so I'm very happy too!

Dialogues.Speaker: Cartethyia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you!

Dialogues.Speaker: Cartethyia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's not nothing. The purpose of this ceremony is to remind everyone that they're amazing and it's time to relax. This is a reward for everyone striving to live a good life!

Dialogues.Speaker: Cartethyia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We've all seen your hard work, {PlayerName}. That's why you should enjoy this day too!
